4. The five largest birds that are able to fly have the following weights: 16.3, 16.8, 20.9, 15.8, and 15.8 kilograms.
a. What is the median weight?______b_____ kg
b. What is the mode?______b_____ kg
c. What is the range?______b_____ kg
d. What is the mean?______b_____ kg
